name: Thursday
description: 2021, canvas / acrylic, 135 * 90 cm.  | And God saw that the light was good. And God separated the light from the darkness. Genesis 1: 4 |  (Participants in the picture: Birthday of the author. Four cardinal points. The Sun - as an Absolute Black Body. The strange Lorenz attractor. All coincidences are fictional) | I've always liked Thursday for its atmosphere. This border day separates the week into morning and sunset. Things change on Thursday. This is a day for the unknown.  | P.S. The work was created specifically for the Image of the Day project.
